thread.title: BELTIV
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by BELTIV

author: BELTIV
title: BELTIV
text:
I ordered mats and backboard for three projects. Arrived via Fed Ex with obvious major damage to the package which on inspection resulted in damage to all three. I contacted Matboard and More who immediately offered to resend mats. Second time they arrived via USPS in perfect shape. I just finished all three projects and everything was perfect! I will definitely order additional material from Matboard and More.
Matboard and More (and USPS) get an A+, FedEx not so good.
